id.description:
Primary identifier for the shopping mall guest user session.

This is an UUID string uniquely identifying this guest user record.

ip_address.description:
IP address from which the guest user connected.

It records the network address of the guest session.

access_url.description:
URL accessed by the guest user at session start.

This is a very long string up to 80000 characters (URL length).

referrer.description:
HTTP referrer URL if any.

Optional, can be null if no referrer.

user_agent.description:
User-Agent string of the guest browser.

Optional, can be null.

session_start_at.description:
Session start timestamp (ISO 8601 format).

Records when guest session was initiated.

session_end_at.description:
Session end timestamp (ISO 8601 format), nullable.

Tracks when the guest session ended or expired.

created_at.description:
Record creation timestamp.

When the guest session record was created.

updated_at.description:
Record last update timestamp.

When the guest session record was last updated.

deleted_at.description:
Logical deletion timestamp.

Represents soft delete field, null if active.

IShoppingMallGuestUser.description:
Represents a guest user session in the shopping mall system.

Tracks network, session, browser, and lifecycle metadata for unauthenticated users.

ip_address.description:
IP address from which the guest is connecting.

Required as string.

access_url.description:
Access URL the guest used to arrive at the mall.

Required string, very long format.

referrer.description:
HTTP referrer URL.

Optional and nullable.

user_agent.description:
User-Agent string of the guest browser.

Optional and nullable.

IShoppingMallGuestUser.IJoin.description:
Request payload for creating a new guest user session.

The system generates session specific information.

Client may provide IP address, access URL, referrer and user agent.

id.description:
Unique identifier of the authenticated guest user session.

UUID string.

ip_address.description:
IP address from which the guest user connected.

It records the network address of the guest session.

access_url.description:
URL accessed by the guest user at session start.

This is a very long string up to 80000 characters (URL length).

referrer.description:
HTTP referrer URL if any.

Optional, can be null if no referrer.

user_agent.description:
User-Agent string of the guest browser.

Optional, can be null.

session_start_at.description:
Session start timestamp (ISO 8601 format).

Records when guest session was initiated.

session_end_at.description:
Session end timestamp (ISO 8601 format), nullable.

Tracks when the guest session ended or expired.

created_at.description:
Record creation timestamp.

When the guest session record was created.

updated_at.description:
Record last update timestamp.

When the guest session record was last updated.

deleted_at.description:
Logical deletion timestamp.

Represents soft delete field, null if active.

IShoppingMallGuestUser.IAuthorized.description:
Authorization response for guest user after join or token refresh.

Includes unique ID and JWT token data.

refresh_token.description: JWT refresh token string used to obtain new access tokens.

IShoppingMallGuestUser.IRefresh.description:
Request payload to refresh guest user access tokens.

Contains a refresh token string.

id.description: Primary Key.

email.description: Member's unique email address used for login and communication.

nickname.description: Nickname chosen by the member for display.

full_name.description: Full name of the member for official documentation.

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the member.

status.description: Current status or lifecycle state of the member account (e.g., active, suspended, closed).

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when member account was logically deleted.

IShoppingMallMemberUser.description:
Member user information representing registered customers with authentication credentials and profile data. Members can make purchases, manage orders, and participate in reviews.

Stores essential information including unique email, password hash, nickname, full name, optional phone number, current status, and audit timestamps.

Soft deletion is supported via the deleted_at timestamp for compliance.

This table is central to managing shopping mall customers requiring login and personalization.

All sensitive fields such as password hashes are protected and not exposed in response bodies without security controls.

password_hash.description:
Plain password string for initial account creation.

MUST be hashed by server.

Included in creation request only.

nickname.description: Nickname chosen by the member user.

full_name.description: Full legal name of the member user.

status.description: Initial member user status.

IShoppingMallMemberUser.ICreate.description:
Request payload to create a new member user account.

Excludes auto-generated ID and timestamps.

Excludes password hash in responses except during creation.

id.description: Unique identifier of the authenticated member user.

email.description: Member's unique email address used for login and communication.

nickname.description: Nickname chosen by the member for display.

full_name.description: Full name of the member for official documentation.

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the member.

status.description: Current status or lifecycle state of the member account (e.g., active, suspended, closed).

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when member account was logically deleted.

IShoppingMallMemberUser.IAuthorized.description:
Authorization response including id and JWT token.

Excludes password_hash.

email.description:
Member's unique email address used for login and communication.

You should provide a valid email string matching official member email.

Example: "user@example.com"

password.description:
Member user's plain text login password.

This is the raw secret password the user provides on login.
 
Although hashed_password is stored, login payload expects plain text
password to verify credentials.

The password must be strong, secure, and comply with backend password policy.

Example: "P@ssword123!"

IShoppingMallMemberUser.ILogin.description: User login credentials for the shopping mall member user.

refreshToken.description:
JWT refresh token string provided to renew access tokens.

The token must be valid and unexpired.

Example: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."

IShoppingMallMemberUser.IRefresh.description: Refresh token payload for shopping mall member user session renewal.

email.description:
Seller's unique email address used for login and communication.

Must be a valid email.

Example: "seller@example.com"

password.description:
Plain text password for the seller user on registration.

Will be hashed by backend.
 
Must comply with password policy.

Example: "P@ssword123!"

nickname.description:
Nickname chosen by seller for display.

Example: "BestSeller"

full_name.description:
Full name of the seller for official documents.

Example: "John Doe"

business_registration_number.description:
Official business registration number.

Unique per seller.

Example: "BRN123456789"

IShoppingMallSellerUser.ICreate.description: Creation payload for registering a new seller user.

id.description: Unique identifier of the authenticated seller user

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the seller user

status.description: Current status of the seller account

business_registration_number.description: Unique business registration number of the seller user

deleted_at.description: Deletion timestamp for soft delete

accessToken.description: JWT access token issued after authentication

refreshToken.description: JWT refresh token for renewing access tokens

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IAuthorized.description: Authorization response with tokens and profile for the seller user.

email.description: Seller's email address used for login

password.description: Plain text password for login authentication

refreshToken.description: The JWT refresh token string used to obtain new access tokens.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IRefresh.description:
Payload for refreshing JWT tokens for seller user authentication.

This includes only the refresh token string.

email.description: Registered email address of the seller user requesting a password reset.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IResetPasswordRe.description: Request payload for seller user password reset initiation.

resetToken.description: Secure token received in password reset email allowing password change.

newPassword.description: The new password chosen by the seller user.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IResetPasswordCo.description: Request payload for confirming password reset with new password and reset token received by email.

oldPassword.description: Current password of the seller user for verification.

newPassword.description: New password the seller user wants to set.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IChangePassword.description: Request payload for authenticated seller users to change their password.

email.description: Unique email of the admin user for login.

full_name.description: Full legal name of the administrator.

status.description: Current status of the administrator account (e.g., 'active').

IShoppingMallAdminUser.ICreate.description: Payload for creating a new administrator user account.

id.description: Unique identifier for the administrator user account.

email.description: Administrator's email address used for login and system communication.

password_hash.description: Hashed password for secure authentication of the administrator.

nickname.description: Display nickname used by the administrator.

full_name.description: Full legal name of the administrator user.

status.description: Current operational status of the administrator account, such as active or suspended.

created_at.description: Timestamp marking when the administrator user account was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp marking the last update to the administrator user account.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the administrator user account was logically deleted, if applicable.

IShoppingMallAdminUser.description: System administrator user information with full access and elevated privileges to manage the shopping mall backend platform. Includes authentication credentials and status tracking.

id.description: Unique identifier of the authenticated administrator user

email.description: Administrator's unique email address for login.

password_hash.description: Hashed password for secure authentication of the administrator.

full_name.description: Full legal name of the administrator.

status.description: Current status of the administrator account.

created_at.description: Timestamp marking when the administrator user account was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp marking the last update to the administrator user account.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the administrator user account was logically deleted, if applicable.

IShoppingMallAdminUser.IAuthorized.description:
Authorization response containing JWT token.

This response is returned after successful authentication operations such as login, join, or token refresh for system administrator users.

email.description: Administrator's unique email address for login.

IShoppingMallAdminUser.ILogin.description: Administrator user login credentials containing email and password hash.

token.description: Refresh token string for requesting new access token

IShoppingMallAdminUser.IRefresh.description: Request payload containing refresh token to renew administrator session JWT tokens.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Unique identifier of the sales channel.

code.description:
Unique code identifying the channel. Used in URL paths and API endpoints.

Business rule: Must be unique across all channels.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sales channel.

description.description:
Detailed description of the channel's purpose and characteristics.

Optional field.

status.description:
Status of the channel, e.g., active, inactive, pending.

Note: This field can take values like "active", "inactive"; to be validated in business logic.

created_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was created.

ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

updated_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was last updated.

ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

deleted_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was logically deleted (soft delete).

Optional field.
ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

IShoppingMallChannel.description:
Represents sales channels through which products are sold, such as
websites, mobile apps, or physical kiosks. Channels organize sales under
distinct business contexts and are configured separately to enable
multi-channel commerce.

limit.description: Limitation of records per a page.

status.description: Status filter for the channel.

code.description:
Unique code identifying the channel. Used in URL paths and API endpoints.

Business rule: Must be unique across all channels.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sales channel.

description.description:
Detailed description of the channel's purpose and characteristics.

Optional field.

status.description:
Status of the channel, e.g., active, inactive, pending.

Note: This field can take values like "active", "inactive"; to be validated in business logic.

IShoppingMallChannel.ICreate.description:
Request body schema to create new shopping mall channel.

Required fields are code, name, status.
Optional: description.

code.description:
Unique code identifying the channel. Used in URL paths and API endpoints.

Business rule: Must be unique across all channels.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sales channel.

description.description:
Detailed description of the channel's purpose and characteristics.

Optional field.

status.description:
Status of the channel, e.g., active, inactive, pending.

Note: This field can take values like "active", "inactive"; to be validated in business logic.

deleted_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was logically deleted (soft delete).

Optional field.
ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

IShoppingMallChannel.IUpdate.description:
Request body schema to update shopping mall channel.

All fields optional to support partial updates.
Must include only existing fields.

description and deleted_at support null to clear the field.

limit.description: Limitation of records per a page.

status.description: Current status of the section in the system lifecycle.

IShoppingMallSection.IRequest.description:
Request for paginated list searching and filtering.

Supports filtering by status and pagination parameters.

Fields optional.

id.description:
Primary Key.

Unique identifier of the spatial section.

code.description:
Unique code for identifying the section.

Must be unique.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the section.

status.description: Current status of the section in the system lifecycle.

created_at.description:
Timestamp when the section was created.

ISO 8601 date-time string.

updated_at.description:
Timestamp when the section was last updated.

ISO 8601 date-time string.

deleted_at.description:
Timestamp of soft deletion, if applicable.

Optional ISO 8601 date-time string.

IShoppingMallSection.description:
Defines spatial product groupings similar to store corners, providing a
way to organize products by physical or logical space within channels or
the mall overall.

code.description:
Unique code for identifying the section.

Must be unique.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the section.

status.description: Current status of the section in the system lifecycle.

IShoppingMallSection.ICreate.description:
Request body for creating a new spatial section.

Required fields: code, name, status.
Optional description.

code.description: Unique code for identifying the section.

description.description: Optional detailed description of the section.

status.description: Current status of the section in the system lifecycle.

IShoppingMallSection.IUpdate.description:
Section update payload type allowing partial updates to section properties.

Used to modify section details such as code, name, description, and status.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Belonged sales channel's ID (UUID).

deleted_at.description: Filter for soft deleted entities. If true, return soft deleted only, if false return non deleted only.

search.description: Text search query for filtering by channel or category name.

limit.description: Maximum number of records per page.

IShoppingMallChannelCategory.IRequest.description:
Request parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination of channel-category mappings.

Supports ID filters, search queries, soft deletion flags, and pagination.

id.description: Primary Key.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Belonged sales channel's ID.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the channel-category mapping was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the channel-category mapping was last updated.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the mapping was logically deleted.

channel.description: The sales channel associated with this channel-category mapping.

category.description: The product category associated with this channel-category mapping.

IShoppingMallChannelCategory.description:
Entity representing the mapping between a sales channel and a product category.

This facilitates the channel-specific product categorization structure enabling custom category assignments per channel.

Includes timestamps and soft deletion support.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Belonged sales channel's ID.

IShoppingMallChannelCategory.ICreate.description:
Request body for creating a new channel-category mapping.

Includes sales channel and product category IDs.

Used to associate categories to channels for multi-channel category management.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Belonged sales channel's ID.

IShoppingMallChannelCategory.IUpdate.description:
Request body for updating a channel-category mapping.

Allows updating the linked sales channel or product category.

Supports partial or full update requests.

limit.description: Maximum number of results per page.

sortBy.description: Column name to sort the results by.

search.description: Search keyword for filtering filenames or URLs.

IShoppingMallAttachment.IRequest.description: Request parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination of attachments.

id.description: Unique identifier for the attachment record.

file_url.description: Publicly accessible URL pointing to the file location, typically via CDN.

media_type.description: MIME type of the file, e.g., image/png, application/pdf.

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

upload_ip.description: IP address from which the file was uploaded.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the attachment was uploaded.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the attachment metadata was last modified.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the attachment was logically deleted.

IShoppingMallAttachments.description: Attachment file metadata record representing an uploaded file such as images, documents, or multimedia related to products, posts, and system resources.

file_url.description: Publicly accessible URL pointing to the file location, typically via CDN.

media_type.description: MIME type of the file, e.g., image/png, application/pdf.

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

upload_ip.description: IP address from which the file was uploaded.

IShoppingMallAttachments.ICreate.description: Request payload to create a new attachment file metadata record.

file_url.description: Publicly accessible URL pointing to the file location, typically via CDN.

media_type.description: MIME type of the file, e.g., image/png, application/pdf.

file_size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

upload_ip.description: IP address from which the file was uploaded.

IShoppingMallAttachments.IUpdate.description: Payload for updating existing attachment file metadata.

page.description: Page number for paginated guest user session list.

limit.description: Maximum number of results per page.

sortBy.description: Column name to sort the results by.

search.description: Search keyword for filtering guest user properties.

session_start_after.description: Filter for guest sessions started after this timestamp.

session_start_before.description: Filter for guest sessions started before this timestamp.

status.description: Filter guest sessions by status.

IShoppingMallGuestUsers.IRequest.description: Request parameters for filtering, sorting, and pagination of guest user sessions.

id.description: Primary Key.

ip_address.description: IP address of the guest user connection.

access_url.description: The access URL the guest used to arrive at the mall.

user_agent.description: User-Agent string from the guest browser.

session_start_at.description: Timestamp when the guest session started.

session_end_at.description: Timestamp when the guest session ended or expired.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when guest record was logically deleted, if applicable.

IShoppingMallGuestUsers.description:
Guest user connections to the shopping mall, tracking non-member visitor information per session without authentication credentials. Used for anonymous browsing and session-based identification.

This entity records details such as IP address, access URLs, referrer information, user agent strings, and session timestamps. It supports session lifecycle management with start and end times.

Guest users do not authenticate with credentials but are tracked for analytics and temporary sessions.

The data also supports audit and security monitoring of guest activity in the shopping mall.

ip_address.description: IP address of the guest user connection.

access_url.description: The access URL the guest used to arrive at the mall.

user_agent.description: User-Agent string from the guest browser.

session_start_at.description: Timestamp when the guest session started.

session_end_at.description: Timestamp when the guest session ended or expired.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when guest record was logically deleted, if applicable.

IShoppingMallGuestUsers.IUpdate.description: Update payload for guest user session data. Supports modification of IP address, access URL, referrer, user agent, session timestamps, and logical deletion flag. Optional properties may be omitted if no change is desired.

email.description: Email address of the member user for filtering.

nickname.description: Nickname of the member user for filtering.

status.description: Lifecycle status of the member user for filtering.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp of deletion for filtering.

limit.description: Limit of records per page.

search.description: Fulltext search string for member user aggregation.

orderBy.description: Field to order the results by.

IShoppingMallMemberUser.IRequest.description: Request parameters for filtering and paginating member user list. Provides flexible searching, sorting, and paging for member user management interfaces.

email.description: Member's unique email address used for login and communication.

nickname.description: Nickname chosen by the member for display.

full_name.description: Full name of the member for official documentation.

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the member.

status.description: Current status or lifecycle state of the member account (e.g., active, suspended, closed).

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when member account was logically deleted.

IShoppingMallMemberUser.IUpdate.description: Update payload for member user entity. Supports modifications of email, password hash, nickname, full name, phone number, status, and audit timestamps.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.description: Represents a member with seller permissions including identity, contact, authentication, and business registration details.

id.description: Primary Key as UUID of the seller user

email.description: Unique email address of the seller user

nickname.description: Display nickname of the seller user

full_name.description: Full legal name of the seller user

phone_number.description: Contact phone number of the seller user

status.description: Operational status of the seller user

business_registration_number.description: Unique business registration number of the seller user

deleted_at.description: Deletion timestamp for soft delete

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IRequest.description: Request parameters for searching and paginating seller users.

limit.description: Record limit per page

search.description: Search string to query seller users by email, nickname, or full name

status.description: Status filter for seller users, e.g., active, pending, or suspended.

sort.description: Sort criteria string for ordering results by fields like email or created_at.

IShoppingMallSellerUser.IUpdate.description: Properties for updating seller user information.

email.description: Email address of the seller user; must be unique.

password_hash.description: Hashed password for authentication; stored securely.

nickname.description: Public nickname for display in the platform.

phone_number.description: Optional contact phone number of the seller.

status.description: Operational status of the seller, e.g., active or suspended.

IShoppingMallAdminUser.IRequest.description: Parameters for requesting paginated administrator user lists.

limit.description: Record limit per page

search.description: Search string to query administrator users by email, nickname, or full name

status.description: Account status filter, e.g., active or suspended.

sort.description: Sort order criteria string for administrative user listing.

email.description: Unique email address for administrator login, must be a valid email format.

password_hash.description: Hashed password for the administrator account.

nickname.description: Display nickname for the administrator user.

full_name.description: Full real name of the administrator.

status.description: Current status of the administrator account, e.g., active or suspended.

IShoppingMallAdminUser.IUpdate.description: Update payload for ShoppingMallAdminUser allowing modification of email, password hash, nickname, full name, and status.

page.description: Page number for pagination, must be a positive integer.

limit.description: Maximum number of records per page.

sort.description: Sorting criteria expressed as a string.

search.description: Text search filter for product name or code.

status.description: Status filter such as active, paused, or discontinued.

IShoppingMallSale.IRequest.description: Request payload for searching shopping mall sales with pagination, filtering, and sorting.

id.description: Unique identifier for the sale product.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Identifier of the sales channel this product belongs to.

shopping_mall_section_id.description: Identifier of the sales section this product belongs to, or null if none.

shopping_mall_seller_user_id.description: Identifier of the seller user who owns the product.

code.description: Unique code representing the product for business identification.

status.description: Current lifecycle status of the product such as active, paused, or discontinued.

description.description: Detailed description of the product, optional.

created_at.description: Timestamp when the product record was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the product record was last updated.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the product was soft deleted, or null if not deleted.

IShoppingMallSale.description: Represents a product for sale in the shopping mall system, tied to a sales channel, section, and seller user. Contains lifecycle and price information, and supports soft deletion.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Identifier of the sales channel this new product belongs to.

shopping_mall_section_id.description: Identifier of the sales section this new product belongs to, or null if none.

shopping_mall_seller_user_id.description: Identifier of the seller user who owns the new product.

code.description: Unique code representing the new product for business identification.

status.description: Initial lifecycle status of the new product such as active.

name.description: Name or title of the new product.

description.description: Detailed description of the new product.

price.description: Base price of the new product.

IShoppingMallSale.ICreate.description: Creation payload for a new shopping mall sale product with required channel, seller, code, status, name, and price fields.

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Identifier of the sales channel to update.

shopping_mall_section_id.description: Identifier of the sales section to update, or null if none.

shopping_mall_seller_user_id.description: Identifier of the seller user to update.

code.description: Updated code for the product.

status.description: Updated lifecycle status of the product.

description.description: Updated detailed description of the product.

price.description: Updated base price of the product.

IShoppingMallSale.IUpdate.description: Update payload for modifying fields of a shopping mall sale product. All fields are optional except for ID, which is path parameter.

oneOf.description: Page number.
Limit of records per page.

limit.description: Limit of records per page.

filter.description:
Optional filter criteria.
Can filter snapshots by search text, associated sale ID, date ranges,
status list, and price range.

oneOf.description: Text string to filter snapshots by matching name or code.

searchText.description: Text string to filter snapshots by matching name or code.

oneOf.description: Specific sale ID to filter snapshots.

saleId.description: Specific sale ID to filter snapshots.

oneOf.description: Filters snapshots created on or after this date/time.

createdAfter.description: Filters snapshots created on or after this date/time.

oneOf.description: Filters snapshots created before this date/time.

createdBefore.description: Filters snapshots created before this date/time.

oneOf.description: List of sale status strings to filter.

statuses.description: List of sale status strings to filter.

oneOf.description: Minimum price to filter snapshots.
Maximum price to filter snapshots.

IShoppingMallSaleSnapshot.IRequest.description:
Request parameters for paginated sale snapshot search filtering.
Allows querying snapshots by various search criteria with pagination support.

id.description: Primary Key UUID of the sale snapshot.

code.description: Product code at snapshot time.

status.description: Product status at snapshot time.

description.description: Optional product description at snapshot time.

IShoppingMallSaleSnapshot.description: Snapshot representing immutable historical state of a sale product for audit and rollback.

limit.description: Maximum number of items per page.

saleId.description: UUID of the sale product to retrieve units for.

IShoppingMallSaleUnit.IRequest.description: Request parameters for listing sales units with pagination and filtering.

id.description: Primary key UUID of the sale unit.

shopping_mall_sale_id.description: Foreign key to the sale product.

code.description: Unique code identifying the sale unit under the product.

description.description: Optional description of the sale unit.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp of soft deletion or null if active.

IShoppingMallSaleUnit.description: Entity representing units or components within a sale product.

shopping_mall_sale_id.description: Foreign key UUID to sale product.

code.description: Unique unit code under the sale product.

description.description: Optional sale unit description.

IShoppingMallSaleUnit.ICreate.description: Payload for creating a new sale unit entity.

code.description: Unit code used for identification under the product.

description.description: Detailed description of the unit.

IShoppingMallSaleUnit.IUpdate.description: Partial type to update a sale unit entity. Properties are optional to allow patch-style updates. All string IDs are UUID format strings.

limit.description: Number of items per page

IShoppingMallSaleUnitOption.IRequest.description: Request parameters for searching and paginating sale unit options.

id.description: Primary key of the sale unit option record

additional_price.description: Additional price increment introduced by this option unit

stock_quantity.description: Available stock quantity for this option unit

deleted_at.description: Soft delete timestamp; null if the record is active

IShoppingMallSaleUnitOption.description:
A sale unit option representing configurable options attached to a sale unit.

Includes pricing adjustment and available stock management.

Mapped to the shopping_mall_sale_unit_options table in the database.

shopping_mall_sale_unit_id.description: Belonged sale unit ID to which this option applies

additional_price.description: Incremental price added by this option

stock_quantity.description: Stock quantity available for this option

IShoppingMallSaleUnitOption.ICreate.description: Creation payload for a new sale unit option. All properties are required.

shopping_mall_sale_unit_id.description: Belonged sale unit ID (optional for update)

shopping_mall_sale_option_id.description: Selected sale option ID (optional for update)

IShoppingMallSaleUnitOption.IUpdate.description: Partial update payload for sale unit option. All properties are optional.

id.description: Unique identifier (UUID) for the sale option.

shopping_mall_sale_option_group_id.description: Reference to the sale option group ID (UUID). This group categorizes this sale option logically.

code.description: Unique code representing this sale option. Used for business identification and lookup.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sale option.

type.description: Type of sale option (e.g., selection, boolean).

created_at.description: Timestamp when the sale option was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of last update to the sale option.

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the sale option was logically deleted (soft delete).

IShoppingMallSaleOption.description:
Represents a shopping mall product sale option belonging to an option group with unique code, name and type.

This entity supports product configuration and pricing modules.

Soft deletion is implemented by the deleted_at timestamp.

search.description: Optional filter flag or criteria for search (customized per implementation).

limit.description: Maximum number of items per page.

IShoppingMallSaleOption.IRequest.description: Request parameters for searching, filtering and pagination of shopping mall sale options.

shopping_mall_sale_option_group_id.description: Reference ID to the sale option group.

code.description: Unique code for this sale option.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sale option.

IShoppingMallSaleOption.ICreate.description: Request body schema for creating a new sale option.

shopping_mall_sale_option_group_id.description: Reference ID to the sale option group.

code.description: Unique code for this sale option.

name.description: Human-readable name of the sale option.

deleted_at.description: Soft delete timestamp.

IShoppingMallSaleOption.IUpdate.description: Request body schema for updating an existing sale option.

id.description:
Unique identifier of the sale option group.

@format uuid

code.description:
Unique code for the option group.

Business context: Used to identify option groups distinctly within the sales platform.
Must be unique.

name.description:
Name of the option group.

Provide clear descriptive name for display and management.

IShoppingMallSaleOptionGroup.description:
Represents groups of sale options used to organize option records.

Option groups help in modular product configuration and management.

Uniqueness of codes is mandatory, and audit timestamps support operational tracking.

search.description: Optional filter or search query string.

limit.description: Maximum number of items per page.

IShoppingMallSaleOptionGroup.IRequest.description: Request parameters for searching, filtering and pagination of sale option groups.

code.description:
Unique code for the option group. Required.

Must be unique and non-empty.

name.description: Name of the option group. Required.

IShoppingMallSaleOptionGroup.ICreate.description:
Payload for creating a new sales option group.

Includes the unique group code and descriptive name.

code.description: Option group code. Optional on update, but if provided, must be unique.

name.description: Option group name. Optional on update.

deleted_at.description: Logical deletion date-time. Nullable to unset.

IShoppingMallSaleOptionGroup.IUpdate.description:
Payload for updating a sales option group.

Allows optional modification of code and name.

Supports marking the record as deleted logically.

saleId.description:
Sale product ID to filter inventory records.

Nullable. If null or omitted, do not filter by sale.

optionCombinationCode.description:
Filter matching option combination codes.

Nullable. Use partial match with wildcards if necessary.

minQuantity.description:
Minimum stock quantity filter.

Nullable. Applies to filter inventory with stock_quantity >= minQuantity.

Must be a non-negative integer or null.

maxQuantity.description:
Maximum stock quantity filter.

Nullable. Applies to filter inventory with stock_quantity <= maxQuantity.

Must be a non-negative integer or null.

page.description:
Pagination: page number starting at 1.

Nullable. Defaults to 1 if omitted.

Must be a positive integer.

limit.description:
Pagination: records per page limit.

Nullable. Defaults to 20 or other configured limit.

Must be a positive integer.

orderBy.description:
Sorting field.

Must match one of the sortable fields such as 'created_at', 'stock_quantity'.

Optional.

IShoppingMallInventory.IRequest.description:
Request payload for searching and paginating inventory items.

Includes filters for sale ID, option combination code, stock quantity range, and pagination controls.

id.description:
Unique identifier of the inventory record.

@format uuid

option_combination_code.description:
Option combination code string.

Represents the specific combination of sale options for this inventory record.

stock_quantity.description:
Available stock quantity.

Integer value representing current stock quantity for this option combination.
Typically zero or positive integer.

IShoppingMallInventory.description:
Inventory entity managing stock for sale products by option combinations.

Tracks available stock and supports soft deletion with audit timestamps.

option_combination_code.description: Code representing the combination of options this inventory record applies to.

stock_quantity.description: Available stock quantity for this option combination.

IShoppingMallInventory.ICreate.description:
Create a new inventory record to track stock quantities for a specific sale product option combination.

The operation requires sale product ID, option combination code string, and stock quantity in the request body.

Authorization is limited to adminUser and sellerUser roles for security. The response returns the created inventory entity with persisted timestamps.

oneOf.description: Associated product {@link shopping_mall_sales.id}.
Code representing the combination of options this inventory record applies to.

option_combination_code.description: Code representing the combination of options this inventory record applies to.

oneOf.description: Available stock quantity for this option combination.

stock_quantity.description: Available stock quantity for this option combination.

oneOf.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

deleted_at.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

IShoppingMallInventory.IUpdate.description:
Update specific inventory record with new stock quantity or option combination code.

The operation requires inventory ID path parameter and request body containing updated inventory details.

Authorized roles are adminUser and sellerUser. The response returns the updated inventory record.

oneOf.description: Page number.
Limit of records per page.

limit.description: Limit of records per page.

oneOf.description: Search string filter for category name or code.

search.description: Search string filter for category name or code.

oneOf.description: Status filter for categories such as active or inactive.

status.description: Status filter for categories such as active or inactive.

IShoppingMallCategory.IRequest.description: Category search filters and pagination parameters

id.description: Primary Key.

code.description: Unique category code.

status.description: Category status such as active or inactive.

oneOf.description: Optional category description.

description.description: Optional category description.

oneOf.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

deleted_at.description: Logical deletion timestamp.

IShoppingMallCategory.description: Product category record in the shopping mall with hierarchical support and multi-channel configuration.

code.description: Unique category code.

status.description: Category status such as active or inactive.

oneOf.description: Optional category description.

description.description: Optional category description.

IShoppingMallCategory.ICreate.description:
Create a new product category with specified details.

AdminUser authorization required.

Returns the created product category record.

Validates uniqueness and required fields.

code.description: Unique code of the category; can be updated

status.description: Status of the category

description.description: Description of the category

deleted_at.description: Timestamp of deletion if soft-deleted

IShoppingMallCategory.IUpdate.description:
Input type for updating a shopping mall category entity.

Allows partial update of properties such as code, name, status, and description.

Timestamps may be included for administrative tracking but are optional.

Soft deletion timestamp can be set or cleared.

All properties are optional in update contexts.

deleted_at.description: Filter to include only deleted records if true (nullable)

limit.description: Number of records per page for pagination (nullable)

IShoppingMallCategoryRelations.IRequest.description:
Request type for searching and filtering shopping mall category relations.

Includes optional filters on category IDs, parent and child categories, timestamps, deletion status, and pagination.

Enables precise querying of category hierarchy relations in the mall.

Pagination and sorting assist efficient data retrieval.

id.description: Primary key identifier of the category relation

parent_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the parent category entity

child_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the child category entity

created_at.description: Timestamp when the relation was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the relation was last updated

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the relation was soft deleted

IShoppingMallCategoryRelations.description:
Entity schema representing a parent-child hierarchical relation between categories in the shopping mall.

Includes unique identifiers for both parent and child categories, along with audit timestamps.

Supports soft deletion via deleted_at nullable timestamp.

Used to build and maintain category hierarchies crucial for product classification and navigation.

parent_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the parent category for the relation

child_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the child category for the relation

IShoppingMallCategoryRelations.ICreate.description:
Request type for creating a new parent-child category relation in the shopping mall.

Requires both parent and child category UUIDs.

Establishes a new hierarchical link in the category tree.

parent_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the parent category in the relation

child_shopping_mall_category_id.description: UUID of the child category in the relation

deleted_at.description: Timestamp when the relation was soft deleted

IShoppingMallCategoryRelations.IUpdate.description:
Request type for updating an existing parent-child category relation.

Properties include parent and child category UUIDs and timestamps,
all optional for partial updates.

Supports soft deletion via deleted_at timestamp.

status.description: Optional status filter to search carts.

guest_user_id.description: Optional guest user ID filter (UUID string) to find carts.

member_user_id.description: Optional member user ID filter (UUID string) to find carts.

page.description: Optional page number for pagination (unsigned integer).

limit.description: Optional limit of records per page for pagination (unsigned integer).

IShoppingMallCarts.IRequest.description:
Request type to filter and paginate shopping mall carts.

Includes optional filters for cart status, associated guest user, and member user.

Supports pagination and sorting options.

This type is used for search and index operations on shopping carts.

id.description: Unique identifier of the shopping cart.

guest_user_id.description:
Guest user ID linked to this cart. Nullable if the cart belongs to a member.
Should be a UUID string or null.

member_user_id.description:
Member user ID linked to this cart. Nullable if the cart belongs to a guest.
Should be a UUID string or null.

status.description: Current status of the cart (e.g., active, abandoned, expired).

created_at.description: Cart creation timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

updated_at.description: Cart last updated timestamp in ISO 8601 format.

deleted_at.description: Optional soft deletion timestamp in ISO 8601 format. Null if not deleted.

IShoppingMallCarts.description:
Shopping mall cart entity representing a customer's shopping cart session.

This model keeps track of guest or member user associations, current cart status, and audit timestamps for creation, updates, and soft deletion.

The entity supports soft deletion with the `deleted_at` property.

It is essential for managing the lifecycle and status of user carts within the shopping mall platform.

guest_user_id.description: Optional guest user ID linked to this cart (UUID string). Null if not linked.

member_user_id.description: Optional member user ID linked to this cart (UUID string). Null if not linked.

status.description: Current status of the cart.

IShoppingMallCarts.ICreate.description:
Payload for creating a new shopping mall cart.

Includes optional association to either a guest or member user and the initial status of the cart.

guest_user_id.description: Optional guest user ID linked to this cart (UUID string) for update.

member_user_id.description: Optional member user ID linked to this cart (UUID string) for update.

status.description: Optional current status of the cart.

deleted_at.description: Optional soft deletion timestamp in ISO 8601 format. Null if not deleted.

IShoppingMallCarts.IUpdate.description:
Payload for updating an existing shopping mall cart.

All fields are optional to support partial updates.

Allows modifying associations, status, and soft delete timestamp.

status.description: Optional filter by the status of cart items.

limit.description: Optional pagination limit for the number of items per page.

IShoppingMallCartItem.IRequest.description:
Request type for filtering and paginating shopping mall cart items.

Includes optional status filter and pagination parameters.

Supports sorting and paging for cart item collections.

The entity manages lifecycle status, audit timestamps, and soft deletion.

Optional timestamps are system managed.

Includes audit timestamps for creation and updates.

Includes the IDs referencing the related cart item, option group, and option.

All fields are required and must conform to their respective UUID formats.

Request body for updating an existing cart item option.

Fields are optional and may include changes to the cart item, option group, or option references.

Validation of UUID format is required if fields are present.

IShoppingMallPayment.description:
Payment applied for orders within the shopping mall system. This entity
tracks payment status, associated order, payment method, amount,
transaction details, and timestamps. Supports payment cancellation and
asynchronous confirmation.

@author AutoBE - https://github.com/wrtnlabs/autobe

shopping_mall_order_id.description:
Order ID this payment applies to.

@format uuid

payment_method.description:
Payment method used (e.g., 'credit_card', 'bank_transfer').

Must be one of the known valid payment methods.

payment_status.description: Payment status must be set to "pending" when creating a payment.

shopping_mall_order_id.description:
The ID of the order to which this payment applies.

Optional for update but must be valid if provided.

payment_status.description:
Status of payment.

Allowed values include 'pending', 'confirmed', 'cancelled', 'failed'.

payment_amount.description: Payment amount. Must be positive if provided.

cancelled_at.description: Cancelled timestamp. Nullable to indicate cancellation.

page.description:
Pagination - page number.

Must be positive integer.

limit.description:
Pagination - number of records per page.

Default is 100.

end_time.description: Stage end time in ISO 8601 format, optional.

Nullable. May be null if no specific estimate is available.

IShoppingMallInquiry.description:
Represents a product inquiry submitted by a customer, including content, privacy, and status information.

This entity manages the inquiry's hierarchical relationships and associations with channels, sections, categories, and users.

Handles data integrity through soft deletion and auditing with timestamp fields.

id.description: Primary Key. UUID string identifying the inquiry

shopping_mall_channel_id.description: Associated shopping mall sales channel ID (UUID)

shopping_mall_section_id.description: Associated mall section within channel (UUID or null)

shopping_mall_category_id.description: Category classification of inquiry (UUID or null)

shopping_mall_memberuserid.description: Member user ID who posted the inquiry (UUID or null)

shopping_mall_guestuserid.description: Guest user ID who posted the inquiry (UUID or null)

parent_inquiry_id.description: Parent inquiry ID for hierarchical threading (UUID or null)

inquiry_title.description: Title of the inquiry provided by the customer

inquiry_body.description: Detailed message or question content of the inquiry

is_private.description: Indicates if the inquiry is private and accessible only to authorized roles

is_answered.description: Flag indicating if the inquiry has been answered

status.description: Current status of the inquiry (e.g., 'open', 'closed', 'pending')

created_at.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was created (ISO 8601 string)

updated_at.description: Timestamp when the inquiry was last updated (ISO 8601 string)

deleted_at.description: Soft deletion timestamp; null if not deleted

limit.description: Limit of records per page.

inquiry_title.description: Filter by inquiry title with substring matching.

inquiry_body.description: Filter by inquiry body with substring matching.

status.description: Filter by status string.

shopping_mall_guestuserid.description: Guest user ID who posted the inquiry (UUID or null)

inquiry_title.description: Title of the inquiry provided by the customer

inquiry_body.description: Detailed message or question content of the inquiry

IShoppingMallComment.IRequest.description:
Parameters for filtering, searching, and paginating comments related to inquiries or reviews.

Supports paging with page number and limit per page.
Sort parameters control sorting property and direction.
Filter object allows refined querying by content, status, privacy, and associated user and post IDs.

limit.description: Number of items per page

sort_by.description: Property to sort the results by

sort_order.description: Order direction for sorting (ascending or descending)

search.description: Search string to filter comments based on content

status.description: Filter comments by status, e.g., 'visible', 'hidden'

is_private.description: Filter comments by privacy flag (true or false)

shopping_mall_inquiry_id.description: Filter comments by associated inquiry ID

shopping_mall_review_id.description: Filter comments by associated review ID

shopping_mall_memberuserid.description: Filter comments by member user ID

filter.description: Filter criteria for cart item options

comment_body.description:
Comment body text content.

Represents the message or reply content written by the user.

is_private.description:
Flag indicating if the comment is private.

Private comments are only visible to authorized users.

status.description:
Current status of the comment, such as 'visible', 'hidden', or 'deleted'.

Signifies whether the comment is active or moderated.

IShoppingMallComment.description:
Shopping mall customer product inquiry and review comments.

Includes hierarchical reply support, author identification and privacy settings.

Stored in shopping_mall_comments entity managing comment lifecycle and moderation.

comment_body.description:
Comment body text content.

Represents the message or reply content written by the user.

is_private.description:
Flag indicating if the comment is private.

Private comments are only visible to authorized users.

status.description:
Current status of the comment, such as 'visible', 'hidden', or 'deleted'.

Signifies whether the comment is active or moderated.

parent_comment_id.description:
Optional parent comment ID for hierarchical replies.

Supports nested comment structures.

shopping_mall_inquiry_id.description:
The inquiry ID this comment belongs to, if applicable.

Links the comment to a product inquiry.

shopping_mall_review_id.description:
The review ID this comment belongs to, if applicable.

Connects the comment to a product review.

shopping_mall_memberuserid.description: Optional member user ID of the comment author.

shopping_mall_guestuserid.description: Optional guest user ID of the comment author.

shopping_mall_selleruserid.description: Optional seller user ID of the comment author.

IShoppingMallFavoriteInquiry.description:
Represents a customer's favorite inquiry.

Stores the member user who favorited an inquiry and preserves the inquiry snapshot at the time of favoritism.

Includes timestamps for creation, updates, and optional soft deletion.

Belonged customer's member user ID.

Required UUID of the member user creating the favorite.

shopping_mall_inquiry_snapshot_id.description:
Referenced inquiry snapshot at favoriting time.

Required UUID of the inquiry snapshot.

Payload for creating a new favorite inquiry.

Includes the member user ID and the inquiry snapshot ID to link the favorite correctly.

shopping_mall_inquiry_snapshot_id.description:
Referenced inquiry snapshot at favoriting time.

Optional UUID of the inquiry snapshot.

IShoppingMallFavoriteAddress.IRequest.description: Request object for filtering and paginating favorite address records.

id.description: Primary Key.

shopping_mall_snapshot_id.description: Referenced address snapshot at the time of favoriting {@link shopping_mall_snapshots.id}.

deleted_at.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

IShoppingMallFavoriteAddress.description:
Stores customer's favorite shipping addresses by referencing member users
and address snapshots. Maintains timestamps for creation, updates, and
logical deletion for soft delete capability. Enforces uniqueness of
favorite addresses per member and snapshot pair.

shopping_mall_snapshot_id.description: Referenced address snapshot at the time of favoriting {@link shopping_mall_snapshots.id}.

IShoppingMallFavoriteAddress.ICreate.description:
Create a new favorite address record for a member user referencing an address snapshot, preserving address state at favoriting. The operation records creation and update timestamps and enforces uniqueness constraints.

Validates input to ensure member user and snapshot references exist and are well-formed UUIDs.

Authorization ensures only authenticated users can create their own favorites.

Operation writes to shopping_mall_favorite_addresses table.

Supports personalized address management and notification features.

shopping_mall_snapshot_id.description: Referenced address snapshot at the time of favoriting {@link shopping_mall_snapshots.id}.

deleted_at.description: Logical deletion timestamp for soft delete.

IShoppingMallFavoriteAddress.IUpdate.description:
Update an existing favorite address record identified by its unique ID. Allows changes to address snapshot references and other editable properties while ensuring referential integrity.

Update operation refreshes timestamps and maintains data integrity and uniqueness constraints.

Authorization restricts updates to the owning authenticated member user.

Operates on shopping_mall_favorite_addresses table, supporting accurate and current user address favorites management.

id.description: Primary Key.

entity_type.description:
Specifies the type of the entity being snapshotted (such as 'order',
/// 'product').

entity_id.description:
References the unique identifier of the entity instance the snapshot
/// belongs to.

snapshot_data.description: JSON string containing the complete snapshot data of the entity state.

created_at_from.description: Filter snapshots created after this date.

created_at_to.description: Filter snapshots created before this date.

IShoppingMallSnapshot.IRequest.description:
This operation retrieves a filtered and paginated list of entity snapshots representing immutable historical records for audit, rollback, and compliance.

It operates on the shopping_mall_snapshots table. The request supports complex search criteria and pagination to filter snapshots by entity type, entity ID, and creation date.

No modification operations are supported on snapshots as they are system-generated audit data.

action_details.description: Additional JSON or text details about the action.

performed_at.description: Timestamp when the action was performed.

IShoppingMallSentimentAnalysis.description:
AI-analyzed customer sentiment data derived from product reviews,
inquiries, and other text inputs within the shopping mall system.

Facilitates sentiment tracking over time per product and aggregated
insights to improve business decisions. Records include references to
product and user, sentiment scores, categories, and timestamps.

product_id.description:
Reference to the product analyzed.

UUID of the product to which this sentiment analysis applies.

user_id.description:
Reference to the user who authored the sentiment data; nullable if
anonymous.

Optional UUID of the user who created this sentiment analysis.

sentiment_score.description:
Sentiment score calculated by AI model, typically ranging from -1
(negative) to +1 (positive).

category, source text, and analysis timestamp.

Reference to the user who authored the sentiment data; nullable if
anonymous.

Sentiment score calculated by AI model, typically ranging from -1
(negative) to +1 (positive).

Category of sentiment such as 'positive', 'neutral', or 'negative'.

source_text.description:
Original text analyzed for sentiment.

Allows modification of references to the product and user, sentiment score,
category, source text, analysis timestamp, and logical deletion timestamp.

id.description: Unique identifier representing the guest user's session ID.

id.description: Unique identifier of the sale product.

Timestamp when the dashboard was last run or refreshed.

id.description: Primary Key.

Business rule: Must be unique across all channels.

Optional field.

Status of the channel, e.g., active, inactive, pending.

Timestamp when the channel was created.

ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

updated_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was last updated.

ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

deleted_at.description:
Timestamp when the channel was logically deleted (soft delete).

Optional field.
ISO 8601 date-time string expected.

multi-channel commerce.
